About Me

Here's few things about me...

BIO

I am a Web Developer, with a focus on User Interface design and Front-end development. I am a well-organized individual and a problem solver, Which is what drove me to the complex world of programming. I enjoy conceptualizing ideas for all sorts of web sites, designing interfaces that individuals can interact with intuitively, and utilizing web technologies to discover solutions to real world problems.
